About RAG Systems

RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) is an AI framework that combines:

  • Information retrieval from a knowledge base
  • Natural language generation using LLMs
  • Context-aware response generation

Technical Details

The system uses ChromaDB for vector storage and Ollama for local LLM inference.

Supported Document Types

Format Extension
PDF .pdf
Markdown .md, .markdown
HTML .html, .htm

For more information, visit our documentation.
